details: Reviewed the documentation to understand project goals and requirements.
Initialized GitHub repository and set up basic project structure.
Used Vite to scaffold a modern and fast React development environment.
Complete all assigned development goals for the first day of the sprint.
Conclude research tasks including tech exploration and documentation.
Implement and test new features as part of Day 2 objectives.
Wrap up investigations, notes, and findings from Day 2 research.
